service.title: The Item and Collection Link Relations
service.documentation: RFC 5988 standardized a means of indicating the relationships between resources on the Web. This specification defines a pair of reciprocal link relation types that may be used to express the relationship between a collection and its members.

link.documentation: When included in a resource that represents a collection, the 'item' link relation identifies a target resource that represents a member of that collection.

When included in a resource that represents a member of a collection, the 'collection' link relation identifies a target resource that represents a collection of which the context resource is a member.
